Thank you for your great support!â¨â From the makers of Stickman Base Jumper, Stickman Ski Racer, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and moreâ¨â¨Get your kicks and jump down the highest and most dangerous cliffs all over the planet!â¨Perform different jump styles and get rated by the five judges.â¨Fulfill the requested handicap to qualify for the next jump.â¨â¨FEATURES:â¨â¢ Cliffs up to 125 meters highâ¨â¢ Unique gameplayâ¨â¢ Different jump typesâ¨â¢ Continue last gameâ¨â¢ Bonus points for good or even perfect jumpsâ¨â¢ Smoothest stick animationsâ¨â¢ Tutorialâ¨â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possibleâ¨.â¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Fun and simple.
reviews.comment: Asus Nexus 7 Its easily the best diving game I\'ve played on android. The scoring system is great. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Cydney Rose

reviews.title: Fun and addictive.
reviews.comment: Great game to play when you have some spare time. Very well presented. Try for the perfect dive.
reviews.author: Edward Smith

reviews.title: Nice game.
reviews.comment: This game is so attractive so i don\'t leave my phone for long time
reviews.author: lochan chhetri

reviews.title: Wish I could give it 6 stars
reviews.comment: This is a very addictive game always trying for the perfect dive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: You cant raven get past the first level. Even when I jump and do a flip and dive head first like it says to I still fail. Do not download!!!
reviews.author: Nicholas Jackman

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Get\'s very boring and it\'s very hard\',:(. Uninstalling it!!!  Add free play mode because it\'s very lame to do missions all the time!!!
reviews.author: Laura Marie

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Well easy to play well hard to master , a must download
reviews.author: Marc Sandeman

reviews.title: Above average
reviews.comment: Good casual game with good presentation, too bad no app data sync / cloud game saves.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lots of fun!
reviews.comment: Great fun, and a great time-killer.  Incredibly frustrating, but highly addictive!
reviews.author: Frankie Montes

reviews.comment: Just playing around. Used to be a diver and love. Make my stick guy rip the snot out of some dives, creating some great smacks its fun too.
reviews.author: Amanda Earnest

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Its great I like it and my kids do too
reviews.author: Kyle Young

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: really fun but wished it was better quality. honestly it\'s better than the Apple version by far. so off you played it on Apple before there is much more things on the android version. hoping for an update that may add more types of jumps though. anyway I love the app so much.
reviews.author: Dominic Maurello

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very fun game! Could do with a free mode in my opinion!

reviews.title: Stickman?
reviews.comment: So addictive! Love it and all the Stickman games!

reviews.comment: Lag  at times and just a bad game in general. Has potential tho.  Fix it
